$comment: Please do not edit this schema by hand. Generate it instead by running npm run build:schema.

type.description: the type of event recorded. Either WebScience.advertisements, WebScience.articleContents, WebScience.pageNav, or WebScience.pageNavSensitive

userId.description: a unique ID associated with a participant.

visitId.description: a unique ID associated with a page visit.

title.description: the contents of the title element in the head of the page

textContent.description: The text contents of the article on the page.

url.description: The URL of the page visited
